con:part.con:content: <!--WSDL generated by thinktecture WSCF; version 1.0.13.0--> <!--Tuesday, 28-05-2013 - 10:01 AM--> <definitions name="ClaimsService" targetNamespace="http://bupa.com/ClaimsService" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:import1="urn://com.bupa.bi.claims.GetMemberClaims_v1_0" xmlns:import2="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Faults_v1_0" xmlns:tns="http://bupa.com/ClaimsService" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:import0="urn://com.bupa.bi.claims.SubmitClaim_v1_0" xmlns:soap12="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap12/" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"> <wsdl:documentation xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/">ClaimsService</wsdl:documentation> <types> <xsd:schema> <xsd:import schemaLocation="com.bupa.bi.claims.SubmitClaim_v1_0.xsd" namespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.claims.SubmitClaim_v1_0"/> <xsd:import schemaLocation="com.bupa.bi.claims.GetMemberClaims_v1_0.xsd" namespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.claims.GetMemberClaims_v1_0"/> <xsd:import schemaLocation="com.bupa.bi.common.Faults_v1_0.xsd" namespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Faults_v1_0"/> </xsd:schema> </types> <message name="submitClaimIn"> <wsdl:documentation xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"/> <part name="parameters" element="import0:SubmitClaimRequest"/> </message> <message name="submitClaimOut"> <wsdl:documentation xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"/> <part name="parameters" element="import0:SubmitClaimResponse"/> </message> <message name="ServiceUnavailableFault"> <wsdl:documentation xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/">The service is not available</wsdl:documentation> <part name="fault" element="import2:ServiceUnavailableFault"/> </message> <message name="InternalFault"> <wsdl:documentation xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/">There was an internal fault</wsdl:documentation> <part name="fault" element="import2:InternalFault"/> </message> <message name="ExternalFault"> <wsdl:documentation xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/">There was a fault with one or more of the parameters supplied</wsdl:documentation> <part name="fault" element="import2:ExternalFault"/> </message> <message name="getMemberClaimsIn"> <wsdl:documentation xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"/> <part name="parameters" element="import1:MemberClaimsRequest"/> </message> <message name="getMemberClaimsOut"> <wsdl:documentation xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"/> <part name="parameters" element="import1:MemberClaimsResponse"/> </message> <portType name="ClaimsServiceInterface"> <wsdl:documentation xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/">Claim Service</wsdl:documentation> <operation name="SubmitClaim"> <wsdl:documentation xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"/> <input message="tns:submitClaimIn"/> <output message="tns:submitClaimOut"/> <fault name="ServiceUnavailableFault" message="tns:ServiceUnavailableFault"> <wsdl:documentation xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/">The service was not available</wsdl:documentation> </fault> <fault name="InternalFault" message="tns:InternalFault"> <wsdl:documentation xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/">There was an internal fault</wsdl:documentation> </fault> <fault name="ExternalFault" message="tns:ExternalFault"> <wsdl:documentation xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/">There was a fault with one or more of the parameters supplied</wsdl:documentation> </fault> </operation> <operation name="GetMemberClaims"> <wsdl:documentation xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"/> <input message="tns:getMemberClaimsIn"/> <output message="tns:getMemberClaimsOut"/> <fault name="ServiceUnavailableFault" message="tns:ServiceUnavailableFault"> <wsdl:documentation xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/">The service was not available</wsdl:documentation> </fault> <fault name="InternalFault" message="tns:InternalFault"> <wsdl:documentation xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/">There was an internal fault</wsdl:documentation> </fault> <fault name="ExternalFault" message="tns:ExternalFault"> <wsdl:documentation xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/">There was a fault with one or more of the parameters supplied</wsdl:documentation> </fault> </operation> </portType> <binding name="BasicHttpBinding_ClaimsServiceInterface" type="tns:ClaimsServiceInterface"> <soap:binding transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <operation name="SubmitClaim"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://bupa.com/ClaimsService:submitClaimIn" style="document"/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> <fault name="ServiceUnavailableFault"> <soap:fault use="literal" name="ServiceUnavailableFault" namespace=""/> </fault> <fault name="InternalFault"> <soap:fault use="literal" name="InternalFault" namespace=""/> </fault> <fault name="ExternalFault"> <soap:fault use="literal" name="ExternalFault" namespace=""/> </fault> </operation> <operation name="GetMemberClaims"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://bupa.com/ClaimsService:getMemberClaimsIn" style="document"/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> <fault name="ServiceUnavailableFault"> <soap:fault use="literal" name="ServiceUnavailableFault" namespace=""/> </fault> <fault name="InternalFault"> <soap:fault use="literal" name="InternalFault" namespace=""/> </fault> <fault name="ExternalFault"> <soap:fault use="literal" name="ExternalFault" namespace=""/> </fault> </operation> </binding> </definitions>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.claims.SubmitClaim_v1_0" elementFormDefault="qualified" id="com.bupa.bi.claims.SubmitClaim_v1_0" xmlns="urn://com.bupa.bi.claims.SubmitClaim_v1_0" xmlns:mstns="urn://com.bupa.bi.claims.SubmitClaim_v1_0" xmlns:tns="urn://com.bupa.bi.claims.SubmitClaim_v1_0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:commonDiagnosis="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Diagnosis_v1_0" xmlns:commonProcedure="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Procedure_v1_0" xmlns:commonClaim="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.Claim_v1_0"> <xs:import namespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Diagnosis_v1_0" schemaLocation="com.bupa.bi.common.Diagnosis_v1_0.xsd"/> <xs:import namespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Procedure_v1_0" schemaLocation="com.bupa.bi.common.Procedure_v1_0.xsd"/> <xs:import namespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.Claim_v1_0" schemaLocation="com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.Claim_v1_0.xsd"/> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Request/response pair for submit claim</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="SubmitClaimRequest" type="tns:SubmitClaimRequest" nillable="true"/> <xs:element name="SubmitClaimResponse" type="tns:SubmitClaimResponse" nillable="true"/> <xs:complexType name="SubmitClaimRequest"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Encapsulates the request for a claim to submitted.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="RequestUsername" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The username of the user requesting information.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Claim" type="commonClaim:Claim"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Details of the claim to create.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="SubmitClaimResponse"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Encapsulates the response of a submitted claim.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="BupaClaimId" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Bupa's unique identifier for the claim.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Version" type="xs:int"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The version identifier for the claim.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Diagnosis_v1_0" elementFormDefault="qualified" id="com.bupa.bi.common.Diagnosis_v1_0" xmlns="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Diagnosis_v1_0" xmlns:mstns="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Diagnosis_v1_0" xmlns:tns="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Diagnosis_v1_0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Definition of the common diagnosis type</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="Diagnosis" type="tns:Diagnosis" nillable="true"/> <xs:element name="ArrayOfDiagnosis" type="tns:ArrayOfDiagnosis" nillable="true"/> <xs:complexType name="Diagnosis"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Code" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The code of the diagnosis</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Description" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The description of the diagnosis</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Standard" type="tns:DiagnosisStandard" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The standard of the diagnosis</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ArrayOfDiagnosis"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>A collection of diagnosis.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Diagnosis" type="tns:Diagnosis" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">A diagnosis type.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="DiagnosisStandard"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The list of supported diagnosis standards .</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Unknown"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Unknown value. Not to be used.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="ICD9"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">International Classification of Diseases v9 diagnosis standard</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="ICD10"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">International Classification of Diseases v10 diagnosis standard</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Procedure_v1_0" elementFormDefault="qualified" id="com.bupa.bi.common.Procedure_v1_0" xmlns="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Procedure_v1_0" xmlns:mstns="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Procedure_v1_0" xmlns:tns="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Procedure_v1_0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Definition of the common procedure type</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="Procedure" type="tns:Procedure" nillable="true"/> <xs:complexType name="Procedure"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Code" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The code of the procedure</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Description" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The description of the procedure</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Standard" type="tns:ProcedureStandard" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The standard of the procedure</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="ProcedureStandard"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">A list of procedure codes</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Unknown"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Unknown value. Not to be used.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="CPT"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicates Current Procedural Terminology standard.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Bupa"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Bupa's own standard for procedure codes.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.Claim_v1_0" elementFormDefault="qualified" id="com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.Claim_v1_0" xmlns="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.Claim_v1_0" xmlns:mstns="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.Claim_v1_0" xmlns:tns="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.Claim_v1_0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:commonClaimsInvoice="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.ClaimInvoice_v1_0"> <xs:import namespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.ClaimInvoice_v1_0" schemaLocation="com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.ClaimInvoice_v1_0.xsd"/> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Provides the Claim definition</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="Claim" type="tns:Claim" nillable="true"/> <xs:element name="ArrayOfClaims" type="tns:ArrayOfClaims" nillable="true"/> <xs:complexType name="Claim"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="BupaClaimId" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">BI's unique identifier for the claim. When submitting claims, if a Bupa Identifier is not passed (is null or empty), then it is assumed that this is a new claim. If a Bupa Identifier is supplied then it is assumed that a new version of the claim is being created</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Version" type="xs:int" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The version number of the claim. When a claim is first created it has a version number of 0. Whenever an adjustment is made to that claim, a copy of the current version is taken, the version number on the copy is incremented and the relevant changes are applied to the data on the claim.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PartnerClaimReference" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The originating partner's reference for this claim. To be supplied when a claim is being created. This value will be blank when returning claim information.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="BupaPreAuthReference" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Bupa's unique identifer for the pre-auth on which this claim is based.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Status" type="tns:ClaimStatus" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The status of the claim - either Paid, In Progress or Rejected.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="SuspendReason" type="tns:SuspendReason" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The reason for suspension. If the claims is not suspended this will be blank</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="SuspendReasonDescription" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The reason for suspension expressed as a free text string. If the claim is not suspended this will be blank</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="BupaMemberId" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Bupa's unique identifier for the member against who this claim is made.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ClaimReceivedDate" type="xs:dateTime" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The date the claim was received by the originator.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TotalClaimedAmount" type="xs:decimal" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The total financial amount originally claimed.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TotalPaidAmount" type="xs:decimal" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The total amount actually paid against this claim.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="CurrencyCode" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The code of the currency the claim was made in.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Notes" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Any additional information about the claim.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="MedicalRecordConsent" type="commonClaimsInvoice:ClaimMedicalRecordConsent" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicates if the member gave medical consent for Bupa or Partner to receive a medical report from the treating doctor.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Invoices" type="commonClaimsInvoice:ArrayOfClaimInvoices" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The collection of invoices that make up the claim.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ArrayOfClaims"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Claim" type="tns:Claim" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="ClaimStatus"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">A list of claim status codes</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Unknown"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Unknown value. Not to be used.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="InProgress"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicates that the claim is currently being processed</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Paid"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicates that the claim has been paid</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Suspended"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicates that the claim is suspended.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Rejected"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicates that the claim has been rejected</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SuspendReason"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">A list of claim suspend reason codes</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="None"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en"/> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="AwaitingMedicalReview"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Awaiting Internal Medical Review</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="AwaitingReportAuthorisation"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Awaiting Authorisation For Medical Report</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="HospitalContractNotAgreed"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Hospital Contract Not Agreed</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="MedicalReportRequested"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Medical Report Requested</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="BreakdownOfAccountsRequired"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Need Breakdown Of Accounts</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="FurtherClaimDocumentsRequired"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Further Claim Documents Required</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="BillingRateNotAsContracted"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Billing Not In Line With Agreed Contractual Rates</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="ReferToBupa"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Referral To Bupa International</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="PendingPaymentInstruction"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Pending Payment Instruction</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="AwaitingQualityChecks"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Awaiting Quality Checks</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="ReferredToTeamLeader"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Referred To Team Leader</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="RefundsRequestedNotReceived"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Refunds Requested Not Received</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="RequestingAccountBreakdown"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Requesting Account Breakdown Or Documentation</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="RequestClaimForm"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Request Claim Form</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="TranslationRequired"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Translation Required</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="UnderSpecialInvestigation"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Under Investigation As Advised By Special Investigations Unit</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="AwaitingDiagnosisConfirmation"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Awaiting Confirmation Of Diagnosis</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="PaymentPendingTreatmentCompletion"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Payment To Be Made When Treatment Has Ended</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="AwaitingLegibleDocuments"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Awaiting Clear Document Copies</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.ClaimInvoice_v1_0" elementFormDefault="qualified" id="com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.ClaimInvoice_v1_0" xmlns="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.ClaimInvoice_v1_0" xmlns:mstns="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.ClaimInvoice_v1_0" xmlns:tns="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.ClaimInvoice_v1_0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:commonDiagnosis="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Diagnosis_v1_0" xmlns:commonProcedure="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Procedure_v1_0" xmlns:commonProvider="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Provider_v1_0"> <xs:import namespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Diagnosis_v1_0" schemaLocation="com.bupa.bi.common.Diagnosis_v1_0.xsd"/> <xs:import namespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Procedure_v1_0" schemaLocation="com.bupa.bi.common.Procedure_v1_0.xsd"/> <xs:import namespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Provider_v1_0" schemaLocation="com.bupa.bi.common.Provider_v1_0.xsd"/> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Provides the Claim Invoice definition</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="ClaimInvoice" type="tns:ClaimInvoice" nillable="true"/> <xs:complexType name="ClaimInvoice"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">An individual invoice. One or more invoices make up a claim. Each invoice is a collection of one or more invoice lines.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="InvoiceNumber" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The provider's number for this invoice.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="InvoiceDate" type="xs:dateTime" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The date the invoice was raised.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Provider" type="commonProvider:Provider" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The provider who rendered the invoice.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PayeeType" type="tns:ClaimPayeeType" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">What type of payee received payment (e.g. MainMember, Provider, Group)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TreatmentCountryCode" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation source="http://www.iso.org/iso/country_codes" xml:lang="en">The ISO code for the country the treatment occurred in.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ClaimedAmount" type="xs:decimal" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The financial amount claimed on this invoice.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ClaimedCurrencyCode" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The code of the currency the invoice is made in.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PaidAmount" type="xs:decimal" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The total amount actually paid against this invoice.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PaidCurrencyCode" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The code of the currency the invoice was paid in.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="InvoiceLines" type="tns:ArrayOfClaimInvoiceLines" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The collection of invoice lines that make up this invoice.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PrimaryDiagnosis" type="commonDiagnosis:Diagnosis" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The primary diagnosis of the invoice.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ArrayOfClaimInvoices"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Invoice" type="tns:ClaimInvoice" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ClaimInvoiceLine"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="ItemReference" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The provider's reference for this item.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="BupaBenefitID" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The benefit code which this line claims against.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TreatmentFromDate" type="xs:dateTime" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The first date of the treatment.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TreatmentToDate" type="xs:dateTime" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The last date of the treatment.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="NumberOfIncidents" type="xs:int" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The number of treatment incidents being invoiced for.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ClaimedAmount" type="xs:decimal" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The amount claimed on this line.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PaidAmount" type="xs:decimal" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The amount paid for this line.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="RejectionReason" type="tns:ClaimRejectReason" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicates the rejection reason associated with this line</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="RejectionReasonDescription" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">A description of why this claim was rejected.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Copay" type="xs:decimal" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The amount paid by the member as co-pay.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="CoInsurance" type="xs:decimal" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The amount paid by the member as co-insurance.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PrimaryProcedure" type="commonProcedure:Procedure" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The primary procedure carried out on this line.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ArrayOfClaimInvoiceLines"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="InvoiceLine" type="tns:ClaimInvoiceLine" nillable="true" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="ClaimMedicalRecordConsent"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">A list of medical record consent options</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Unknown"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Unknown value. Not to be used.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Yes"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicates that medical record consent is required</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="No"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicates that medical record consent is not required</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ClaimPayeeType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">A list of claim payee type options</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Unknown"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Unknown value. Not to be used.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="MainMember"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicates that the payee is a main member</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Patient"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicates that the payee is a patient</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Provider"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicates that the payee is a provider</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Group"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicates that the payee is a group</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Other"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicates that the payee is another type of entity</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ClaimRejectReason"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The list of claim rejection reasons</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="MemberNotActive"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The member is not active</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="TreatmentNotCovered"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The treatment is not covered</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="ConditionNotCovered"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The condition is not covered</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="BenefitLimitReached"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The maximum benefit has been reached</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DeductibleOrCoPayApplied"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Deductible, co-insurance or co-pay has been applied</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="ChargeNotAppropriate"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The charge is not appropriate</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="FurtherInformationRequired"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Further information is required</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Provider_v1_0" elementFormDefault="qualified" id="com.bupa.bi.common.Provider_v1_0" xmlns="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Provider_v1_0" xmlns:mstns="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Provider_v1_0" xmlns:tns="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Provider_v1_0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Definition of the common Provider type</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="Provider" type="tns:Provider" nillable="true"/> <xs:complexType name="Provider"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>When Bupa receive a provider record associated with a claim for the first time from a partner, the provider information supplied is stored and allocated a unique Bupa provider number. Subsequent claims may use the BupaProviderId or continue to use the partner's PartnerReference.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="BupaProviderId" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Bupa's unique identifier for the provider</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PartnerReference" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The partner's reference for this provider. This is not returned from Bupa.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Name" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The name of the provider</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="CountryCode" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation source="http://www.iso.org/iso/country_codes" xml:lang="en">The ISO code for the correspondence address of the provider.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.claims.GetMemberClaims_v1_0" elementFormDefault="qualified" id="com.bupa.bi.claims.GetMemberClaims_v1_0" xmlns="urn://com.bupa.bi.claims.GetMemberClaims_v1_0" xmlns:mstns="urn://com.bupa.bi.claims.GetMemberClaims_v1_0" xmlns:tns="urn://com.bupa.bi.claims.GetMemberClaims_v1_0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:commonClaim="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.Claim_v1_0"> <xs:import namespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.Claim_v1_0" schemaLocation="com.bupa.bi.commonclaims.Claim_v1_0.xsd"/> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Request/response pair for member claims retrieval</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="MemberClaimsRequest" type="tns:MemberClaimsRequest" nillable="true"/> <xs:element name="MemberClaimsResponse" type="tns:MemberClaimsResponse" nillable="true"/> <xs:complexType name="MemberClaimsRequest"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Encapsulates the request for claims related to a member</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="RequestUsername" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The username of the user requesting information.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="BupaMemberId" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Bupa's unique identifier for the member for whom the claims information is requested.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="BupaClaimId" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">If provided, then Bupa's unique identifier for the claim for which claim information is requested. The information returned will be the full information on the claim (i.e. all invoices and invoice lines). If not provided then all claims for the member will be returned but they will only contain claim-level information (i.e. no invoice or invoice line data).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="MemberClaimsResponse"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Encapsulates the response for claims related to a member</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Claims" type="commonClaim:ArrayOfClaims" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">An array of claims associated with the member.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema id="com.bupa.bi.common.Faults_v1_0" targetNamespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Faults_v1_0" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Faults_v1_0" xmlns:mstns="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Faults_v1_0" xmlns:tns="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Faults_v1_0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Definition of the faults which may emanate from Bupa Systems</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="InternalFault" type="tns:InternalFault" nillable="true"/> <xs:element name="ExternalFault" type="tns:ExternalFault" nillable="true"/> <xs:element name="ServiceUnavailableFault" type="tns:ServiceUnavailableFault" nillable="true"/> <xs:complexType name="InternalFault"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Definition of the InternalFault type. This fault type is used to indicate faults which have occured within the Bupa system.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Description" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Holds a description which contains details regarding the internal fault</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="RetryIndicator" type="xs:boolean" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Holds an indicator which described whether the fault may be rectified by retrying</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ExternalFault"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Definition of the ExternalFault type. This fault type is used to indicate faults which have occured due to incorrect supply of data</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Description" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Holds a description which contains details of why the external fault occured</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Code" type="tns:ExternalFaultCode" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Holds a value which indicates the category of external fault generated</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ServiceUnavailableFault"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Definition of the ServiceUnavailableFault type. This fault type is used to indicate faults which have occured due to system being temporarily out of service</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Information" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Holds information which is associated with service downtime and restoration expectations</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="ExternalFaultCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The list of external fault codes which indicate general reasons as to why a fault has occured</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="InsufficientDataSupplied"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Insufficient data has been supplied to execute the request</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="IncompatibleDataSupplied"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Incompatible data was supplied in one or more fields or data supplied was not compatible with existing data</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="GeneralValidationFailure"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">A general validation error occured</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="RequestedDataNotFound"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The requested data was not found</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="AuthorizationFailure"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The connecting client could not be authorized</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="OperationNotImplemented"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The requested operation has not been implemented and is not supported</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Other"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">A general error occured which could not be classified</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema>
